00172       // Parameters for different types of particle pairs
00173       double epsilon_[MaxAtomType][MaxAtomType];   
00174       double sigma_[MaxAtomType][MaxAtomType];     
00175       double sigmaSq_[MaxAtomType][MaxAtomType];   
00176       double ce_[MaxAtomType][MaxAtomType];        
00177       double cf_[MaxAtomType][MaxAtomType];        
00178

00194    // inline methods 
00195  
00196    /* 
00197    * Calculate interaction energy for a pair, as function of squared distance.
00198    */
00199    inline double DpdPair::energy(double rsq, int i, int j) const 
00200    {
00201       double dr;
00202       if (rsq < sigmaSq_[i][j]) {
00203          dr = sqrt(rsq) - sigma_[i][j];
00204          return ce_[i][j]*dr*dr;
00205       } else {
00206          return 0.0;
00207       }
00208    }
00209    
00210    /* 
00211    * Calculate force/distance for a pair as function of squared distance.
00212    */
00213    inline double DpdPair::forceOverR(double rsq, int i, int j) const
00214    {
00215       if (rsq < sigmaSq_[i][j]) {
00216          return cf_[i][j]*(sigma_[i][j]/sqrt(rsq) - 1.0);
00217       } else {
00218          return 0.0;
00219       }
00220    }
00221 
00222 }
